word_mean: 绕垂直轴转动的人字闸门、三角闸门门轴柱顶端的支承装置。

sentence.Network_en: Pressure - compensated air bearings are used on both ends of the trunnion axis.
sentence.Network_cn: 耳轴两端各用一压力补偿空气轴承.

sentence.Network_en: The full series are structure of trunnion mounted ball.
sentence.Network_cn: 全系列采用固定球结构.

sentence.Network_en: Special Trunnion sizes and configurations are available. Consult factory when ordering.
sentence.Network_cn: 可提供特殊的轴径尺寸和配置,请在订购时咨询工厂.
